com.liferay.portletmvc4spring.multipart

Interface MultipartResourceRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    javax.portlet.ClientDataRequest, MultipartRequest, javax.portlet.PortletRequest, javax.portlet.RenderState, javax.portlet.ResourceRequest
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMultipartResourceRequest

    public interface MultipartResourceRequest
extends javax.portlet.ResourceRequest, MultipartRequest
    Interface which provides additional methods for dealing with multipart content within a portlet request, allowing to access uploaded files. Implementations also need to override the standard ResourceRequest methods for parameter access, making multipart parameters available.

    A concrete implementation is DefaultMultipartResourceRequest.

    Since:
    5.1
    Author:
    Neil Griffin
    See Also:
    PortletMultipartResolver, MultipartFile, PortletRequest.getParameter(java.lang.String), PortletRequest.getParameterNames(), PortletRequest.getParameterMap()
